description: Gone are the days of disposable flip flops in the trash heap. These sturdy slippers are built strong to last long, using durable PU and reinforced construction that’s water friendly. If that’s not enough, feel the difference of our LUVSEAT™ arch-support underfoot for a surprising degree of comfort that lasts all day. Whether beach bound or mountain town, look to Chaco for the flip that won’t flop.
name: Chaco Classic Leather Flip - Mens

specs.value: Signature LUVSEAT™ footbed for all-day support and comfort
Non-marking ChacoGrip™ rubber compound with wave fin traction design
